Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.selenium.functions.intreraction

Class InteractiveAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.SequentialActionSupplier<SeleniumStepContext,​org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions,​InteractiveAction>
      • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.selenium.functions.intreraction.InteractiveAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Action<SeleniumStepContext>>, ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.parameters.StepParameterPojo
    public abstract class InteractiveAction
extends ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.SequentialActionSupplier<SeleniumStepContext,​org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions,​InteractiveAction>
    This class is designed to build an interactive action performed on a page.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • keyDown

        public static InteractiveAction keyDown​(CharSequence key)
        Builds an action that performs the modifier key pressing.
        Parameters:
        key - Either Keys.SHIFT, Keys.ALT or Keys.CONTROL. If the provided key is none of those, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Returns:
        an instance of InteractiveAction

      • keyDown

        public static InteractiveAction keyDown​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target,
                                        CharSequence key)
        Builds an action that performs the modifier key pressing on some web element.
        Parameters:
        key - Either Keys.SHIFT, Keys.ALT or Keys.CONTROL. If the provided key is none of those, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        target - WebElement to perform the action
        Returns:
        an instance of InteractiveAction

      • keyDown

                                        CharSequence key)
        Builds an action that performs the modifier key pressing on some widget element.
        Parameters:
        key - Either Keys.SHIFT, Keys.ALT or Keys.CONTROL. If the provided key is none of those, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        target - widget to perform the action
        Returns:
        an instance of InteractiveAction

                                        CharSequence key)
        Builds an action that performs the modifier key pressing on some element.
        Parameters:
        howToFind - is description of the element to be found
        key - Either Keys.SHIFT, Keys.ALT or Keys.CONTROL. If the provided key is none of those, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Returns:
        an instance of InteractiveAction

      • moveToElement

        public static InteractiveAction moveToElement​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target,
                                              int xOffset,
                                              int yOffset)
        Builds an action that moves the mouse to an offset from the top-left corner of the web element.
        Parameters:
        target - element to move to.
        xOffset - Offset from the top-left corner. A negative value means coordinates left from the element.
        yOffset - Offset from the top-left corner. A negative value means coordinates above the element.
        Returns:
        an instance of InteractiveAction

      • moveByOffset

        public static InteractiveAction moveByOffset​(int xOffset,
                                             int yOffset)
        Builds an action that moves the mouse from the current position (or 0,0) by the given offset. If the coordinates provided are outside the viewport (the mouse will end up outside the browser window) then the viewport is scrolled to match.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - horizontal offset. A negative value means moving the mouse left.
        yOffset - vertical offset. A negative value means moving the mouse up.
        Returns:
        an instance of InteractiveAction
